10 of the Coolest Record Players Currently Available

posted by Aaron Tian on October 29, 2014 in Features, News
1

PreviousShift + ← / NextShift + →

Image via www.thephysicsmill.com

By Aaron Tian

As the internet marches forward with faster downloading and innumerable streaming options, lots of people are turning back to vinyl for all sorts of different reasons. Whether it's the more immersive, tactile nature of records or wanting a better quality listening experience, vinyl sales rose by 32% in the U.S. in 2013. Breaking into the vinyl market, however, needs a little more planning (and investment) than throwing a file into your iTunes and putting in some earbuds.

The choice and variety of record players available is huge, with prices ranging from a few hundred dollars to many thousands. If you're thinking of buying a record player, we encourage you to do lots of research and maybe even, scary as it seems, go to a store and talk to an expert IRL. To help you get an idea of what's out there, and what you might want to spend your money on, here are 10 of the coolest record players you can buy right now.
